---
title: "About Me"
---

I am an Assistant Professor in the Department of Political Science at the University of Rochester. My research focuses on political economy and economic history.

I hold a Ph.D. in Political Economy and Government from Harvard University. My research was supported by a Stone PhD Scholarship in Inequality and Wealth Concentration. 

Prior to my doctoral studies, I earned a MSc in Economic History from the London School of Economics and Political Science and a BS in Mathematics and Economics from American University in Washington, DC.

I can be reached at cpetroff[at]ur.rochester.edu.
